dcterms:creator: M. Strens
dcterms:description: A continuous action space version of the n-chain environment where agents start in the S1 state and aim to reach the terminal state SN by selecting continuous values from [0,1]. The probability of moving to the next state is proportional to the difference between their action and hidden values sampled from a Beta distribution.
dcterms:title: Continuous N-Chain Environment

dcterms:creator: E. Coumans
Y. Bai
dcterms:description: A physics simulation environment for robotics and machine learning, used for tasks such as the Inverted Double Pendulum and Ant Walker, allowing for complex robot control experiments.
dcterms:title: Inverted Double Pendulum and Ant Walker
